abstract: The future of Saab is hanging in the balance, and Spyker gave no indication of when a deal might be clinched.
snippet: The future of Saab is hanging in the balance, and Spyker gave no indication of when a deal might be clinched.
lead_paragraph: Spyker Cars said on Monday it was still in talks to buy Swedish auto brand Saab from General Motors. Spyker, the Dutch luxury carmaker, gave no indication of when a deal might be clinched.

headline.main: Spyker Says It’s Still in Talks With G.M. Over Saab
